title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 April 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Bugen\_do> has quit  
01:33 <lucaa> has quit  
01:44 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
01:45 <npm> It appears http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/WikiMacroClass has a bug -- org.xwiki.rendering.internal.macro.include.IncludeMacro.checkRecursiveInclusion() not working.  
01:47 <npm> or rather it is, but it makes the viewer give warning: "Failed to execute the [include] macro. Click on this message for details."

10:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: missing @since for new methods in c4e8f48197c2839eb20aa70adb3681f07f181c7e  
10:06 <tmortagne> looking  
10:06 <vmassol> for the 2 new methods  
10:12 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <tmortagne> fixed  
10:19 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:19 <tmortagne> ha forgot one in another class

11:05 <lucaa> has quit  
11:10 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:10 <vmassol> thanks tmortagne  
11:10 <lucaa> has quit  
11:12 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: don't forget to move branch stable-7.0.x to 7.0.2-SNAPSHOT  
11:13 <gdelhumeau> sure  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: you can announce the release on twitter  
11:19 <gdelhumeau> BTW, I had added some information on the ReleasePlanHelp document to find old version and replace them by new version, but it's not there anymore  
11:19 <gdelhumeau> do someone remove it for some reason?  
11:19 <vmassol> yes  
11:19 <vmassol> I removed them  
11:20 <vmassol> because the script is doing it automatically now :)  
11:20 <gdelhumeau> it seems not :(  
11:20 <gdelhumeau> or did you do it after my release?  
11:20 <vmassol> it did it for the 6.4.4 release  
11:21 <vmassol> that i performed 1à days ago or so  
11:21 <vmassol> 10  
11:21 <vmassol> thomas fixed several things  
11:21 <vmassol> in the script  
11:22 <gdelhumeau> then it did not work for the stable-7.0.x branch  
11:22 <gdelhumeau> or maybe I have tipped the wrong version :(  
11:23 <vmassol> thats more likely to me :)  
11:29 <woshilapin> has quit  
11:29 <tmortagne> vmassol: did not worked for 6.4.4 release either as far as I can see in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/stable-6.4.x/pom.xml  
11:29 <cjd> has quit  
11:29 <tmortagne> the branch is still on 6.4.4-SNAPSHOT  
11:30 <vmassol> hmm maybe i mixed up 6.4.4 and 6.4.5  
11:31 <tmortagne> AFAIK what is in the script does not really work anymore  
11:31 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
11:31 <tmortagne> the move is done but for some reason it's does not ends up on github  
11:31 <tmortagne> probably some wrong merge or push  
11:33 <tmortagne> never found like to look at it again and it's something that is not easy to test without polluting github
